      public String RegisterUser(String name, String id, boolean type)
      This method register a user in the system.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the user
      id - id of the user
      type - type of the user
      Returns:
      a message that indicates if the user was registered successfully or not

    • RegisterMagazine

      public String RegisterMagazine(String id, String name, int pages, String date, int pagesRead, float price, String image, String category, int issuanceFrequency, int subscriptions)
      This method register a magazine in the system.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the book
      name - name of the book
      pages - number of pages of the book
      date - date of publication of the book
      pagesRead - number of pages read of the book
      price - price of the book
      image - image of the book
      category - category of the book
      issuanceFrequency - frequency of issuance of the book
      subscriptions - number of subscriptions of the book
      Returns:
      a message that indicates if the magazine was registered successfully or not

      public String RegisterBook(String id, String name, int pages, String date, int pagesRead, float price, String image, String review, String genre, int soldCopies)
      This method register a book in the system.
      Parameters:
      id - id of the book
      name - name of the book
      pages - number of pages of the book
      date - date of publication of the book
      pagesRead - number of pages read of the book
      price - price of the book
      image - image url of the book
      review - review of the book
      genre - genre of the book
      soldCopies - number of sold copies of the book
      Returns:
      a message that indicates if the book was registered successfully or not

      public String ModifyMagazine(String id, String name, int pages, String date, String category, String image, float price, int issuanceFrequency, int subscriptions, int pagesRead)
      This method modifies the information of a Magazine
      Parameters:
      id - new id of the magazine
      name - new name of the magazine
      pages - new number of pages of the magazine
      date - new date of publication of the magazine
      category - new category of the magazine
      image - new image url of the magazine
      price - new price of the magazine
      issuanceFrequency - new frequency of issuance of the magazine
      subscriptions - new number of subscriptions of the magazine
      pagesRead - new number of pages read of the magazine
      Returns:
      a message that indicates if the magazine was modified successfully or not
